humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, there is metastases in 1 right axillary sentinel lymph node (No. 1D) out of 12 assessed lymph nodes. This corresponds to the N1 stage as per the AJCC staging system (New Rule 12). The remaining 11 right axillary sentinel lymph nodes are negative for metastatic cancer. Therefore, the N stage for this patient's cancer is N1.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The patient has metastasis in 1 out of 12 right axillary sentinel lymph nodes (AJCC pN1 mi (sn)). The remaining 11 right axillary sentinel lymph nodes are negative for metastatic cancer. This indicates a pathologic N stage of N1.
